name: places/ChIJbSs9nltZwokRw6NHntMwy-U
formattedAddress: 125 W 21st St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 125 W 21st St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: I love it here! I was pretty nervous at first since I haven’t done serious workouts in while let alone in a sauna. But the TSA’s are super helpful and kind and don’t make me feel judged when I explain some workouts are harder for me than others. They simply encourage me and even give help tips on workouts to try that I’ll like. I’ve notice a change in my body and mind and for sure see myself coming here for a while!

originalText.text:
I love this place. I was looking for a place that I can do hot Pilates, and hot yoga at an affordable price. I was amazed this place offered more than that, they have a bunch of classes including 15-minute hitt classes. Also I love the fact the place is open is 24 hours a day so I can have the flexibility to do a workout any day at any time. I’m
also getting the benefits of the infrared red sauna which boots my collagen, I can sleep better and detox my body all for a very affordable price.

originalText.text: This location is mucher dirtier than the Greenwich location which I have my own reviews about. Front desk girl was nice at least, red hair.

originalText.text: HOTWORX Chelsea has been so amazing to me! They have showed so much support to me along my fitness journey. The space is very clean and the TSAs are more then helpful.
